document.full_text: regan smith moved in front on a caution nine laps from the end and survived a green-white-checker finish to win the southern 500 for his first sprint cup victory saturday night.
document.title: breakthrough and some bad blood at darlington
lines_and_colors: regan smith moved in front on a caution nine laps from the end and survived a green-white-checker finish to win the southern 500 for his first sprint cup victory saturday night.
